oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bound with: Sarīyat al-ḥaqq wa-al-intiṣār wa-al-dhabb ʻan awliyāʼ Allāh al-akhyār / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣaghīr al-Shinjīṭī -- al-ʻAḍud al-yamānī fī al-radd ʻan Shaykhinā Sīdī Aḥmad al-Tijānī / Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Tijānī -- al-Jaysh al-kafīl bi-akhd al-thaʼr mimman salla ʻalá al-Shaykh al-Tijānī sayf al-inkār / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣaghīr al-Shinjīṭī.
